name: stl-verify
description: Multi-chain blockchain data fetching and risk calculation service

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cd /tmp && bun build $OLDPWD/src/index.ts --compile --outfile stl-verify && cp stl-verify $OLDPWD/dist/
scripts.build:linux: mkdir -p dist && cd /tmp && bun build $OLDPWD/src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile stl-verify-linux && cp stl-verify-linux $OLDPWD/dist/
scripts.build:linux-arm: mkdir -p dist && cd /tmp && bun build $OLDPWD/src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile stl-verify-linux-arm && cp stl-verify-linux-arm $OLDPWD/dist/
